mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_grade (id, gradeStuId, gradeSubId, gradeStu, gradeSubName, gradeLimit, gradeJudge, gradeAlterTime, gradeViolate, gradeReview) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeStuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeSubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeStu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeSubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeLimit,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gradeJudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gradeViolate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeReview,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select id, gradeStuId, gradeSubId, gradeStu, gradeSubName, gradeLimit, gradeJudge, gradeAlterTime, gradeViolate, gradeReview from t_exam_grade
